info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51043
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51043
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.
metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46440
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46440
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 1687166029 3600 900 1209600 300

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4832
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4832
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.
metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: DNS DMARC - Detect
author: juliosmelo
info.description: DNS DMARC information was detected.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9917
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9917
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1;p=none;"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14230
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 14230
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
metiers.numerique.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ~all"

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: metiers.numerique.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:

Le site des métiers du numérique évolue !

Retrouvez toutes nos offres dans le domaine du numérique sur choisirleservicepublic.gouv.fr, qui recense plus de 4000 offres à date.

Pourquoi venir travailler
dans le public ?

  • Pour participer
    à des missions d’intérêt général variées
  • Pour avoir de l’impact
    auprès de tes co-citoyens et co-citoyennes
  • Pour donner du sens à ton travail
    en améliorant le service public chaque jour
Découvrir les témoignages
Devenir un talent du numérique de l'État

Les employeurs de la semaine

Service du numérique du Ministère de la justice

Service du numérique du Ministère de la culture

Sous-direction de l’informatique du service de l'environnement professionnel au Ministère de l'économie, des finances et de la relance

Tous les employeurs

On reste en contact ?

Laisse-nous ton adresse mail ci-dessous et reçois des informations sur les métiers du numérique au sein de l’État. Promis on ne te spammera pas !

info.name: GraphQL Alias-based Batching
author: dolev farhi
info.description:
GraphQL supports aliasing of multiple sub-queries into a single queries. This allows users to request multiple objects or multiple instances of objects efficiently.
However, an attacker can leverage this feature to evade many security measures, including rate limit.
info.remediation: Limit queries aliasing in your GraphQL Engine to ensure mitigation of aliasing-based attacks.

request:
POST /api/graphql HTTP/1.1
Host: metiers.numerique.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 149
Content-Type: application/json
Accept-Encoding: gzip

{"query":"query {\n qusfg1:__typename \n qusfg2:__typename \n qusfg3:__typename \n qusfg4:__typename \n qusfg5:__typename \n qusfg6:__typename \n }"}
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 113
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Accept, Content-Type, Origin, X-Requested-With
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://metiers.numerique.gouv.fr
Content-Type: application/json
Date: Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:05:21 GMT
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Request-Id: dcd0745c-2ad9-4a95-a42d-a379f31e364e

{"data":{"qusfg1":"Query","qusfg2":"Query","qusfg3":"Query","qusfg4":"Query","qusfg5":"Query","qusfg6":"Query"}}
curl-command:
curl -X 'POST' -d '{"query":"query {
 qusfg1:__typename 
 qusfg2:__typename 
 qusfg3:__typename 
 qusfg4:__typename 
 qusfg5:__typename 
 qusfg6:__typename 
 }"}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'Host: metiers.numerique.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://metiers.numerique.gouv.fr/api/graphql'

info.name: GraphQL Field Suggestion Information Disclosure
author: dolev farhi
info.description:
If introspection is disabled on your target, Field Suggestion can allow users to still earn information on the GraphQL schema.
By default, GraphQL backends have a feature for fields and operations suggestions.
If you try to query a field but you have made a typo, GraphQL will attempt to suggest fields that are similar to the initial attempt.

request:
POST /api/graphql HTTP/1.1
Host: metiers.numerique.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 69
Content-Type: application/json
Accept-Encoding: gzip

{"query":"query {\n  __schema {\n directive\n }\n}","variables":null}
response:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Connection: close
Content-Length: 404
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Accept, Content-Type, Origin, X-Requested-With
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://metiers.numerique.gouv.fr
Content-Type: application/json
Date: Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:05:21 GMT
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Request-Id: b83fa69b-a8e9-4d87-a996-0760497844c1

{"errors":[{"message":"GraphQL introspection is not allowed by Apollo Server, but the query contained __schema or __type. To enable introspection, pass introspection: true to ApolloServer in production","extensions":{"code":"GRAPHQL_VALIDATION_FAILED"}},{"message":"Cannot query field \"directive\" on type \"__Schema\". Did you mean \"directives\"?","extensions":{"code":"GRAPHQL_VALIDATION_FAILED"}}]}

info.name: GraphQL CSRF / GET method
author: dolev farhi
info.description:
Cross Site Request Forgery happens when an external website gains ability to make API calls impersonating an user if he visits the website while being authenticated to your API.
Allowing API calls through GET requests can lead to CSRF attacks, because cookies are added automatically to GET requests by the browser.

request:
GET /api/graphql?query={__typename} HTTP/1.1
Host: metiers.numerique.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 32
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Accept, Content-Type, Origin, X-Requested-With
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://metiers.numerique.gouv.fr
Content-Type: application/json
Date: Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:05:21 GMT
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Request-Id: 115ceb30-549d-40f1-9030-ab77dc13363d

{"data":{"__typename":"Query"}}

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
